const collectChanges=useCallback(result=>{if(!result)return;const newChanges=[];// Extract changes from originalLines (DiffEngine returns originalLines and changedLines)

Clear AI results first to regenerate."));return;}setIsGeneratingAI(true);try{if(groqService.current.isConfigured()){// Use Groq API when configured (PREFERRED)
